<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Leucrotta](/Monsters.aspx?ID=718)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The vile and vicious offspring of a demon lord and a monstrous species of hyenas, leucrottas are intelligent and cruel beasts. They use their astounding vocal mimicry to lure unsuspecting creatures near so that they can first torment and then devour them. Leucrottas measure 5 feet at the shoulder and weigh 800 pounds, and they are perpetually filthy. A leucrotta's oversized jaws are lined with rows of jagged, hardened bony ridges rather than teeth, and it can shear through flesh, bone, and even steel with ease.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Leucrotta.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Leucrotta](/Monsters.aspx?ID=718)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 162 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); one additional language (usually Gnoll)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Language Adaptation** A leucrotta can learn any language it hears spoken for at least 10 minutes, adding it to its languages known and replacing the language it previously learned using this ability. Typically, a leucrotta knows Gnoll as the language granted by this ability.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 85

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jagged jaws +15 ([fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 2d8+8 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d4+8 bludgeoning

**Luring Cry** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) 60 feet; **Requirements** The leucrotta's last action was Sound Mimicry; **Effect** The leucrotta utters a plaintive cry to draw its prey closer. Each creature within the emanation that was deceived by Sound Mimicry must succeed at a DC 19 Will save or become **fascinated** and compelled to move toward the sound of the leucrotta's voice on their turn. Fascinated creatures are also **flat-footed**. If the leucrotta attacks, the fascinated condition ends only for the creature that is attacked. If the leucrotta speaks a creature's name while using its Luring Cry, that creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to their saving throw to resist the ability. On a successful save, a creature is temporarily immune to Luring Cry for 24 hours.

**Sound Mimicry** <actions string="Single Action" />  The leucrotta perfectly imitates voices and speech and attempts a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check against listeners' Will DC to fool them. The leucrotta gains a +4 bonus to this Deception check if it has listened to the creature it's imitating for at least 10 minutes at any point in the last 24 hours. The leucrotta can't duplicate voice-based abilities or spells, though it can perfectly mimic the sound of verbal spellcasting and can attempt to deceive [constructs](/Traits.aspx?ID=35) or [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) that respond to voice commands. The leucrotta can't imitate speech in languages it doesn't know.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_4_RelatedCreatures.png">Gnoll Masters</title>

Leucrottas often associate with gnolls. They never submit to serve others as beasts of burden, but they sometimes permit gnoll leaders who impress them to ride them into battle as steeds. More often, a leucrotta considers itself to be the true leader of a gnoll clan, whispering and manipulating a gnoll warchief into doing its bidding or (if it tires of the game) goading them into challenging the leucrotta for leadership and then taking over the clan directly after eliminating its rival.
</aside>
